metadata.title: CVE-2024-53164 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: sched: fix ordering of qlen adjustmentChanges to sch->q.qlen around qdisc_tree_reduce_backlog() need to happen_before_ a call to said function because otherwise it may fail to notifyparent qdiscs when the child is about to become empty.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
